text: I've been really happy since the day we met again 😌
There are many things I value in you...
Your wisdom, your kindness, your badass and very cute style 😻
And above all, this connection we have, those sweet, honest and empathetic conversations
I think they make us a beautiful and strong together ❤️
All of this really makes me want to be there for you, and support you all the way
And that is the meaning of the little surprise I have for you today...
Open the package 😉📦 and swipe for more 👉
It is Myoovi, a device that, hopefully 🤞, will get rid of your period cramps 🩵
And here is how it works 🤓
I hope it will help you every time you experience those belly hard time 🤍
And for anything Myoovi can't help with, I'll be there 😘
